author: Torres
name: Zea mays
comments: Ni initial concentrations are weirdly reported. The data of this article might be wrong. the unities were reported as kg/kg-3, but it does not make sense, it was assumed as an error and as mg kg-1 or mg dm-3 (used as synonyms in the article)
